import re
from urllib.parse import urlparse

def base_url(url):
    """ 
    Returns the base url given a full url
    """
    parsed_uri = urlparse(url)
    base_url = '{uri.scheme}://{uri.netloc}/'.format(uri=parsed_uri)
    
    return base_url
